Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தேறினும் தேறா விடினும் அழிவின்கண் தேறான் பகாஅன் விடல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Whether you trust them or not, in times of trouble, it is best to neither fully befriend nor fully separate from them.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is in a difficult situation, a time of ruin or crisis ('அழிவின்கண்'). An untrustworthy person or a former enemy ('தேறான்') is nearby.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The person is shown walking a very careful, neutral path. They are not embracing the untrustworthy person in friendship ('பகாஅன்'), nor are they pushing them away into open enmity ('விடல்').
Layered_Composition.Background: This delicate act of neutrality is visualized as them walking on a tightrope, keeping a careful, balanced distance from the untrustworthy figure. They are neither friend nor foe for the duration of the crisis.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: In a time of crisis, whether you trust a person or not, the wise path is one of neutrality: neither embrace them as an ally nor make them an open enemy.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The tightrope walk is the metaphor for the difficult, delicate balance of neutrality. The goal is to keep the untrustworthy person at a specific, managed distance.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Neutral, cautious, diplomatic, a delicate balance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A grey, uncertain, foggy atmosphere, reflecting the crisis. The tightrope and the two figures are the only clear elements.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that emphasizes the tension and the skill required for the tightrope walk of neutrality.

Cultural_Anchors: Neither separate from nor join with the untrustworthy.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: person hugging the enemy, person fighting the enemy, text artifacts.
